questions.question: The fundamental grouping of particles in a crystal is called

explanations.a: A space lattice is an array of points showing how particles are arranged.
explanations.b: Lattice point is a single point in the space lattice.
explanations.c: Bravais lattice is a classification of lattices, not the basic grouping.
explanations.d: Unit cell is the smallest repeating unit, but not the grouping itself.

questions.question: The Unit cell that contains only one lattice point at the corner is known as

explanations.a: Space groups describe symmetry, not cell type.
explanations.c: Lattice point is a location, not a cell.
explanations.d: Primitive cells contain only one lattice point, formed from corner atoms.
